00019     SimParticleBuilder::SimParticleBuilder() :
00020             currentEvent_(nullptr) {
00021         trackMap_ = UserTrackingAction::getUserTrackingAction()->getTrackMap();
00022         outputParticleColl_ = new TClonesArray(EventConstants::SIM_PARTICLE.c_str(), 50);
00023     }
00024 
00025     SimParticleBuilder::~SimParticleBuilder() {
00026         delete outputParticleColl_;
00027     }
00028 
00029     void SimParticleBuilder::buildSimParticles(ldmx::Event* outputEvent) {
00030 
00031         // Clear the output particle collection.
00032         outputParticleColl_->Clear("C");
00033 
00034         // Get the trajectory container for the event.
00035         TrajectoryContainer* trajectories = (TrajectoryContainer*) (const_cast<G4Event*>(currentEvent_))->GetTrajectoryContainer();
00036 
00037         // Create empty SimParticle objects and create the map of track ID to particles.
00038         buildParticleMap(trajectories, outputParticleColl_);
00039 
00040         // Fill information into the particles.
00041         for (auto trajectory : *trajectories->GetVector()) {
00042             buildSimParticle(static_cast<Trajectory*>(trajectory));
00043         }
00044 
00045         // Add the collection data to the output event.
00046         outputEvent->add("SimParticles", outputParticleColl_);
00047     }
00048 
00049     void SimParticleBuilder::buildSimParticle(Trajectory* traj) {
00050 
00051         SimParticle* simParticle = particleMap_[traj->GetTrackID()];
00052 
00053         if (!simParticle) {
00054             std::cerr << "[ SimParticleBuilder ] : SimParticle not found for Trajectory with track ID " << traj->GetTrackID() << std::endl;
00055             G4Exception("SimParticleBuilder::buildSimParticle", "", FatalException, "SimParticle not found for Trajectory.");
00056         }
00057 
00058         simParticle->setGenStatus(traj->getGenStatus());
00059         simParticle->setPdgID(traj->GetPDGEncoding());
00060         simParticle->setCharge(traj->GetCharge());
00061         simParticle->setMass(traj->getMass());
00062         simParticle->setEnergy(traj->getEnergy());
00063         simParticle->setTime(traj->getGlobalTime());
00064         simParticle->setProcessType(traj->getProcessType());
00065 
00066         const G4ThreeVector& vertex = traj->getVertexPosition();
00067         simParticle->setVertex(vertex[0], vertex[1], vertex[2]);
00068 
00069         const G4ThreeVector& momentum = traj->GetInitialMomentum();
00070         simParticle->setMomentum(momentum[0], momentum[1], momentum[2]);
00071 
00072         const G4ThreeVector& endpMomentum = traj->getEndPointMomentum();
00073         simParticle->setEndPointMomentum(endpMomentum[0], endpMomentum[1], endpMomentum[2]);
00074 
00075         G4ThreeVector endpoint = traj->getEndPoint();
00076         simParticle->setEndPoint(endpoint[0], endpoint[1], endpoint[2]);
00077 
00078         if (traj->GetParentID() > 0) {
00079             SimParticle* parent = findSimParticle(traj->GetParentID());
00080             if (parent != nullptr) {
00081                 simParticle->addParent(parent);
00082                 parent->addDaughter(simParticle);
00083             } else {
00084                 // If the parent particle can not be found by its track ID, this is a fatal error!
00085                 std::cerr << "[ SimParticleBuilder ] : ERROR - SimParticle with parent ID " << traj->GetParentID() << " not found for track ID " << traj->GetTrackID() << std::endl;
00086                 G4Exception("SimParticleBuilder::buildSimParticle", "", FatalException, "SimParticle not found from parent track ID.");
00087             }
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00091     void SimParticleBuilder::buildParticleMap(TrajectoryContainer* trajectories, TClonesArray* simParticleColl) {
00092         particleMap_.clear();
00093         for (auto trajectory : *trajectories->GetVector()) {
00094             particleMap_[trajectory->GetTrackID()] = (SimParticle*) simParticleColl->ConstructedAt(simParticleColl->GetEntries());
00095         }
00096     }
00097 
00098     SimParticle* SimParticleBuilder::findSimParticle(G4int trackID) {
00099         G4VTrajectory* traj = trackMap_->findTrajectory(trackID);
00100         if (traj != nullptr) {
00101             return particleMap_[traj->GetTrackID()];
00102         } else {
00103             return nullptr;
00104         }
00105     }
00106
